project.description: Provides methods for dealing with MIME (RFC 2045) and related e-mail (RFC 822/2822/5322) standards.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/*.tgz php -d include_path=".:${WORKSPACE}/../../php-hudson-tools/workspace/pear/pear/php" ${WORKSPACE}/../../php-hudson-tools/workspace/pear/pear/horde-components -t ../../../../templates --pearrc ${WORKSPACE}/../../php-hudson-tools/workspace/pear/pear/../.pearrc -D ${WORKSPACE}/Horde_Mime-H4.spec -N ${WORKSPACE}/../../horde-git/workspace/framework/Mime mkdir -p /kolab/RPM/SRC/Horde_Mime-H4 rsync -avz --delete-after ${WORKSPACE}/ /kolab/RPM/SRC/Horde_Mime-H4/ /kolab/bin/openpkg rpm -ba Horde_Mime-H4.spec /kolab/bin/openpkg rpm -ihv --force /kolab/RPM/PKG/Horde_Mime-H4-*.`/kolab/bin/openpkg rpm -q --qf="%{ARCH}-%{OS}" openpkg`-kolab.rpm rm -rf /kolab/RPM/PGK/Horde_Mime-H4-*
